name: Unicorn-Cat Ruined My Life: Impossible Magic Rainbow Side-Scroller Survival On A Crazy Little Adventure
name_original: Unicorn-Cat Ruined My Life: Impossible Magic Rainbow Side-Scroller Survival On A Crazy Little Adventure
description:
You have all witnessed the Flappy Trend trend going on in the App Store. We decided to make it better! Unicorn-Cat Ruined My Life is the new hit game on the App Store to change the game!

Take control of Unicorn-Cat and his super cool friends and fly them through the messed up, challenging world! Find power ups, upgrades and more goodness shattered throughout the game world.
